subjects_details: In two consecutive studies, each in 12 healthy male volunteers (age 20-40 years), the pharmacokinetics of caffeine and its major metabolite paraxanthine alone and at the end of 4 days of treatment with several quinolones (Table 1) were investigated. Thine- free diet (no tea, coffee or chocolate) from 36 h before the first dose of caffeine until the end of the second sampling period.
